info.name: Vipps Partner API - Collection
info.description:
The Vipps Partner API lets partners, banks and large corporations manage
their merchants (for example, submit product orders on behalf of their
merchants) and sales units.
More information: https://github.com/vippsas/vipps-partner-api


Contact Support:
 Name: Vipps AS
 Email: integration@vipps.no

item.name: Order products on behalf of merchants

header.description: (Required) Vipps Subscription Key
(Required) Idempotency key for the request, ensures idempotent actions. Not required, but recommended.

request.description:
IMPORTANT: This endpoint is not yet available. This notice will be removed when it is. Order products on behalf of merchants:
Partners can submit data that pre-fills the order form, so the merchant
can review the information and submit the product order on portal.vipps.no.
